1.caption: 1985 NBA All-Star Game
1.description: The 35th National Basketball Association All-Star Game was played on February 10, 1985, at the Hoosier Dome in Indianapolis, Indiana. The coaches were K. C. Jones (Boston Celtics) for the East, and Pat Riley (Los Angeles Lakers) for the West. The MVP was Ralph Sampson, Houston (29 minutes, 24 points, 10 rebounds).
1.inspected:Announcers: Dick Stockton, Tom HeinsohnRick Barry, Bill Russell, John Andariese and Rod Hundley (All-Star Saturday)
1.inspected:Arena: Hoosier Dome Market Square Arena (All-Star Saturday)
1.inspected:Referees: Mike Mathis and Ed T. Rush
